It was released in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Publix" title="Publix">Publix</a> and <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Walmart" title="Walmart">Walmart</a> stores and made available for delivery on <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gopuff" title="Gopuff">Gopuff</a> in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_Florida" title="South Florida">South Florida</a> the following day.<sup id="cite_ref-SafidDeen2024_398-1" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-SafidDeen2024-398"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>394<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Más+ is affiliated with <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/White_Claw_Hard_Seltzer" title="White Claw Hard Seltzer">White Claw Hard Seltzer</a> founder Mark Anthony.<sup id="cite_ref-JessicaBroadbent2024_400-0" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-JessicaBroadbent2024-400"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>396<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Later that year, on 19 September 2024, Messi announced that he would be launching a production company called 525 Rosario, named after his hometown. Headquartered in Miami and <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Los_Angeles" title="Los Angeles">Los Angeles</a>, the company was created to produce film, sporting events and branded commercials for athletes worldwide. It would be a joint venture with Smuggler Entertainment, who co-produced <i>Messi's World Cup: The Rise of a Legend</i> earlier in 2024.<sup id="cite_ref-401" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-401"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>397<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<div class="mw-heading mw-heading2"><h2 id="Personal_life">Personal life</h2></div>
<div class="mw-heading mw-heading3"><h3 id="Family_and_relationships">Family and relationships</h3></div>
<p>Since 2008, Messi has been in a relationship with <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antonela_Roccuzzo" title="Antonela Roccuzzo">Antonela Roccuzzo</a>, who he eventually married on 30 June 2017 in their hometown of <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rosario,_Santa_Fe" class="mw-redirect" title="Rosario, Santa Fe">Rosario</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-402" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-402"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>398<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-403" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-403"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>399<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> He has known Roccuzzo since he was five years old, as she is the cousin of his childhood best friend, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lucas_Scaglia" title="Lucas Scaglia">Lucas Scaglia</a>, who is also a football player.<sup id="cite_ref-404" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-404"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>400<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> After keeping their relationship private for a year, Messi first confirmed their romance in an interview in January 2009, before going public a month later during a carnival in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sitges" title="Sitges">Sitges</a> after the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Derbi_Barcelon%C3%AD" title="Derbi Barceloní">Barcelona–Espanyol derby</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-405" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-405"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>401<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Messi and Roccuzzo have three sons. To celebrate his partner's first pregnancy, Messi placed the ball under his shirt after scoring in Argentina's 4–0 win against Ecuador on 2 June 2012, before confirming the pregnancy in an interview two weeks later.<sup id="cite_ref-406" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-406"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>402<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Thiago was born in Barcelona on 2 November 2012.<sup id="cite_ref-407" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-407"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>403<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> In April 2015, Messi confirmed that they were expecting another child.<sup id="cite_ref-408" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-408"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>404<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> In October 2017, his wife announced they were expecting their third child.<sup id="cite_ref-409" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-409"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>405<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Messi and his family are <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catholic" class="mw-redirect" title="Catholic">Catholic</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-410" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-410"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>406<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Messi enjoys a close relationship with his immediate family members, particularly his mother, Celia, whose face he has tattooed on his left shoulder. His professional affairs are largely run as a family business: his father, Jorge, has been his agent since he was 14, and his oldest brother, Rodrigo, handles his daily schedule and publicity. His mother and other brother, Matías, manage his charitable organization, the Leo Messi Foundation, and take care of personal and professional matters in Rosario.<sup id="cite_ref-FOOTNOTEBalagué201331,_143,_570_411-0" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-FOOTNOTEBalagu%C3%A9201331,_143,_570-411"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>407<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Since leaving for Spain aged 13, Messi has maintained close ties to his hometown of Rosario, even preserving his distinct <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rioplatense_Spanish" title="Rioplatense Spanish">Rosarino accent</a>. He has kept ownership of his family's old house, although it has long stood empty; he maintains a penthouse apartment in an exclusive residential building for his mother, as well as a family compound just outside the city. Once when he was in training with the national team in Buenos Aires, he made a three-hour trip by car to Rosario immediately after practice to have dinner with his family, spent the night with them, and returned to Buenos Aires the next day in time for practice. Messi keeps in daily contact via phone and text with a small group of confidants in Rosario, most of whom were fellow members of "The Machine of '87" at Newell's Old Boys. He was on bad terms with the club after his transfer to Barcelona, but by 2012 their public feud had ended, with Newell's embracing their ties with Messi, even issuing a club membership card to his newborn son.<sup id="cite_ref-Here_32-5" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-Here-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>28<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-FOOTNOTEBalagué2013576–577_375-3" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-FOOTNOTEBalagu%C3%A92013576%E2%80%93577-375"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>371<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-412" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-412"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>408<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Messi has long planned to return to Rosario to end his playing career at Newell's.<sup id="cite_ref-413" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-413"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>409<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Messi holds triple citizenship, as he is a citizen of Argentina, Italy, and Spain.<sup id="cite_ref-414" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-414"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>410<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<div class="mw-heading mw-heading3"><h3 id="Tax_fraud">Tax fraud</h3></div>
<p>Messi's financial affairs came under investigation in 2013 for suspected <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tax_evasion" title="Tax evasion">tax evasion</a>. Offshore companies in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tax_haven" title="Tax haven">tax havens</a> Uruguay and <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Belize" title="Belize">Belize</a> were used to evade €4.1&nbsp;million in taxes related to sponsorship earnings between 2007 and 2009. An unrelated <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shell_company" class="mw-redirect" title="Shell company">shell company</a> in Panama set up in 2012 was subsequently identified as belonging to the Messis in the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Panama_Papers" title="Panama Papers">Panama Papers</a> data leak. Messi, who pleaded ignorance of the alleged scheme, voluntarily paid arrears of €5.1&nbsp;million in August 2013. On 6 July 2016, Messi and his father were both found guilty of tax fraud and were handed <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suspended_sentence" title="Suspended sentence">suspended</a> 21-month prison sentences and respectively ordered to pay €1.7&nbsp;million and €1.4&nbsp;million in fines.<sup id="cite_ref-415" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-415"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>411<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Facing the judge, he said, "I just played football. I signed the contracts because I trusted my dad and the lawyers and we had decided that they would take charge of those things."<sup id="cite_ref-416" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-416"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>412<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<div class="mw-heading mw-heading2"><h2 id="Career_statistics">Career statistics</h2></div>

<li id="cite_note-473"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_ref-473" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Nine appearances and five goals in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2022_FIFA_World_Cup_qualification" title="2022 FIFA World Cup qualification">2022 FIFA World Cup qualification</a>, seven appearances and four goals in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2021_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2021 Copa América">2021 Copa América</a>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-474"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_ref-474" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Two appearances and one goal in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2022_FIFA_World_Cup_qualification" title="2022 FIFA World Cup qualification">2022 FIFA World Cup qualification</a>, one appearance in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2022_Finalissima" title="2022 Finalissima">2022 Finalissima</a>, seven appearances and seven goals in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2022_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2022 FIFA World Cup">2022 FIFA World Cup</a>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-475"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_ref-475" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Appearances in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2026_FIFA_World_Cup_qualification" title="2026 FIFA World Cup qualification">2026 FIFA World Cup qualification</a>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-476"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_ref-476" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Five appearances and one goal in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2024_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2024 Copa América">2024 Copa América</a>, four appearances and three goals in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2026_FIFA_World_Cup_qualification" title="2026 FIFA World Cup qualification">2026 FIFA World Cup qualification</a>.</span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<div class="mw-heading mw-heading2"><h2 id="Honours">Honours</h2></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1236090951"><div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">For a comprehensive listing of Messi's achievements, see <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_career_achievements_by_Lionel_Messi" title="List of career achievements by Lionel Messi">List of career achievements by Lionel Messi</a>.</div>
<figure class="mw-default-size" typeof="mw:File/Thumb"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Messi_with_Neymar_Junior_the_Future_of_Brazil.jpg" class="mw-file-description"><img src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/250px-Messi_with_Neymar_Junior_the_Future_of_Brazil.jpg" decoding="async" width="230" height="219" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/3e/Messi_with_Neymar_Junior_the_Future_of_Brazil.jpg/500px-Messi_with_Neymar_Junior_the_Future_of_Brazil.jpg 1.5x" data-file-width="3411" data-file-height="3241"></a><figcaption>Messi (<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FIFA_Club_World_Cup_awards#Golden_Ball" title="FIFA Club World Cup awards">Golden Ball winner</a>) pictured with future teammate <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Neymar" title="Neymar">Neymar</a> (Bronze Ball winner) at the conclusion of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2011_FIFA_Club_World_Cup_final" title="2011 FIFA Club World Cup final">2011 FIFA Club World Cup final</a>.</figcaption></figure>
<p><b>Barcelona</b><sup id="cite_ref-BarcelonaHonours_14-1" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-BarcelonaHonours-14"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-FIFAHonours_15-1" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-FIFAHonours-15"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>12<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-ElGrafico_23-1" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-ElGrafico-23"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>20<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/La_Liga" title="La Liga">La Liga</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2004%E2%80%9305_La_Liga" title="2004–05 La Liga">2004–05</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2005%E2%80%9306_La_Liga" title="2005–06 La Liga">2005–06</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2008%E2%80%9309_La_Liga" title="2008–09 La Liga">2008–09</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2009%E2%80%9310_La_Liga" title="2009–10 La Liga">2009–10</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2010%E2%80%9311_La_Liga" title="2010–11 La Liga">2010–11</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2012%E2%80%9313_La_Liga" title="2012–13 La Liga">2012–13</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2014%E2%80%9315_La_Liga" title="2014–15 La Liga">2014–15</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2015%E2%80%9316_La_Liga" title="2015–16 La Liga">2015–16</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2017%E2%80%9318_La_Liga" title="2017–18 La Liga">2017–18</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018%E2%80%9319_La_Liga" title="2018–19 La Liga">2018–19</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Copa_del_Rey" title="Copa del Rey">Copa del Rey</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2008%E2%80%9309_Copa_del_Rey" title="2008–09 Copa del Rey">2008–09</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2011%E2%80%9312_Copa_del_Rey" title="2011–12 Copa del Rey">2011–12</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2014%E2%80%9315_Copa_del_Rey" title="2014–15 Copa del Rey">2014–15</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2015%E2%80%9316_Copa_del_Rey" title="2015–16 Copa del Rey">2015–16</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2016%E2%80%9317_Copa_del_Rey" title="2016–17 Copa del Rey">2016–17</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2017%E2%80%9318_Copa_del_Rey" title="2017–18 Copa del Rey">2017–18</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2020%E2%80%9321_Copa_del_Rey" title="2020–21 Copa del Rey">2020–21</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Supercopa_de_Espa%C3%B1a" title="Supercopa de España">Supercopa de España</a>:<sup id="cite_ref-2005Supercopa_24-1" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-2005Supercopa-24"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>note 3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2006_Supercopa_de_Espa%C3%B1a" title="2006 Supercopa de España">2006</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2009_Supercopa_de_Espa%C3%B1a" title="2009 Supercopa de España">2009</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2010_Supercopa_de_Espa%C3%B1a" title="2010 Supercopa de España">2010</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2011_Supercopa_de_Espa%C3%B1a" title="2011 Supercopa de España">2011</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2013_Supercopa_de_Espa%C3%B1a" title="2013 Supercopa de España">2013</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2016_Supercopa_de_Espa%C3%B1a" title="2016 Supercopa de España">2016</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_Supercopa_de_Espa%C3%B1a" title="2018 Supercopa de España">2018</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UEFA_Champions_League" title="UEFA Champions League">UEFA Champions League</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2005%E2%80%9306_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2005–06 UEFA Champions League">2005–06</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2008%E2%80%9309_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2008–09 UEFA Champions League">2008–09</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2010%E2%80%9311_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2010–11 UEFA Champions League">2010–11</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2014%E2%80%9315_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2014–15 UEFA Champions League">2014–15</a></li>

<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UEFA_Men%27s_Player_of_the_Year_Award" title="UEFA Men&#39;s Player of the Year Award">UEFA Men's Player of the Year Award</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UEFA_Men%27s_Player_of_the_Year_Award#2010%E2%80%9311" title="UEFA Men&#39;s Player of the Year Award">2010–11</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UEFA_Men%27s_Player_of_the_Year_Award#2014%E2%80%9315" title="UEFA Men&#39;s Player of the Year Award">2014–15</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_UEFA_Champions_League_top_scorers#Top_scorers_by_season" title="List of UEFA Champions League top scorers">UEFA Champions League top scorer</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2008%E2%80%9309_UEFA_Champions_League#Top_goalscorers" title="2008–09 UEFA Champions League">2008–09</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2009%E2%80%9310_UEFA_Champions_League#Top_goalscorers" title="2009–10 UEFA Champions League">2009–10</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2010%E2%80%9311_UEFA_Champions_League#Top_goalscorers" title="2010–11 UEFA Champions League">2010–11</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2011%E2%80%9312_UEFA_Champions_League#Top_goalscorers" title="2011–12 UEFA Champions League">2011–12</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2014%E2%80%9315_UEFA_Champions_League#Top_goalscorers" title="2014–15 UEFA Champions League">2014–15</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018%E2%80%9319_UEFA_Champions_League#Top_goalscorers" title="2018–19 UEFA Champions League">2018–19</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Copa_Am%C3%A9rica_awards#Golden_Ball" title="Copa América awards">Copa América Golden Ball</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2015_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica#Awards" title="2015 Copa América">2015</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2021_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica#Awards" title="2021 Copa América">2021</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Copa_Am%C3%A9rica_awards#Golden_Boot" title="Copa América awards">Copa América Golden Boot</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2021_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica#Awards" title="2021 Copa América">2021</a></li>

<div class="mw-heading mw-heading2"><h2 id="Notes">Notes</h2></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1239543626"><div class="reflist reflist-upper-alpha"></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1239543626"><div class="reflist reflist-note"><div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-7"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_ref-7" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">According to FCBarcelona.com, and his authorised biography, <i>Messi</i> by <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guillem_Balagu%C3%A9" title="Guillem Balagué">Guillem Balagué</a>, his surname is the single "Messi", in accordance with Argentine customs.<sup id="cite_ref-BarcaProfile_3-0" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-BarcaProfile-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-FOOTNOTEBalagué201332–37_4-0" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-FOOTNOTEBalagu%C3%A9201332%E2%80%9337-4"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Other sources, including a 2014 document by <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FIFA" title="FIFA">FIFA</a>, give his surname as the double "Messi Cuccittini".<sup id="cite_ref-5" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-5"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>4<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> After winning a libel case in 2017, Messi's own management company stated: "The football player <b>Lionel Andres Messi Cuccittini</b> has donated a total of €72,783.20 to the organisation <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doctors_Without_Borders" class="mw-redirect" title="Doctors Without Borders">Doctors Without Borders</a>."<sup id="cite_ref-6" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-6"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>5<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-BDOFIFA-13"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_ref-BDOFIFA_13-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_ref-BDOFIFA_13-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_ref-BDOFIFA_13-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Messi received <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France_Football" title="France Football">France Football</a></i><span class="nowrap" style="padding-left:0.1em;">'</span>s <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2009_Ballon_d%27Or" title="2009 Ballon d&#39;Or">2009 Ballon d'Or</a> and <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FIFA" title="FIFA">FIFA</a>'s <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2009_FIFA_World_Player_of_the_Year" title="2009 FIFA World Player of the Year">2009 FIFA World Player of the Year</a> award, prior to their <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FIFA_Ballon_d%27Or#History" title="FIFA Ballon d&#39;Or">six-year merger</a>; he proceeded to win the newly formed award, the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FIFA_Ballon_d%27Or" title="FIFA Ballon d&#39;Or">FIFA Ballon d'Or</a>, four times: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2010_FIFA_Ballon_d%27Or" title="2010 FIFA Ballon d&#39;Or">2010</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2011_FIFA_Ballon_d%27Or" title="2011 FIFA Ballon d&#39;Or">2011</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2012_FIFA_Ballon_d%27Or" title="2012 FIFA Ballon d&#39;Or">2012</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2015_FIFA_Ballon_d%27Or" title="2015 FIFA Ballon d&#39;Or">2015</a>. Both organisations credited him with five (FIFA) Ballon d'Or awards.<sup id="cite_ref-8" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-8"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>6<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-9" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-9"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>7<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-10" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>8<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> He then went on to win the Ballon d'Or three more times – <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2019_Ballon_d%27Or" title="2019 Ballon d&#39;Or">2019</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2021_Ballon_d%27Or" title="2021 Ballon d&#39;Or">2021</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2023_Ballon_d%27Or" title="2023 Ballon d&#39;Or">2023</a> – again solely assigned by <i>France Football</i>, and won the newly established <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Best_FIFA_Men%27s_Player" title="The Best FIFA Men&#39;s Player">The Best FIFA Men's Player</a> three times as well – <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Best_FIFA_Football_Awards_2019#The_Best_FIFA_Men&#39;s_Player" title="The Best FIFA Football Awards 2019">2019</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Best_FIFA_Football_Awards_2022#The_Best_FIFA_Men&#39;s_Player" title="The Best FIFA Football Awards 2022">2022</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Best_FIFA_Football_Awards_2023#The_Best_FIFA_Men&#39;s_Player" title="The Best FIFA Football Awards 2023">2023</a>. <i>France Football</i> recognizes him as a record eight-time Ballon d'Or winner and FIFA recognizes him as a record eight-time world's best player.<sup id="cite_ref-11" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>9<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-12" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-12"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-2005Supercopa-24"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_ref-2005Supercopa_24-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_ref-2005Supercopa_24-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">According to <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FC_Barcelona" title="FC Barcelona">FC Barcelona</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-BarcelonaHonours_14-0" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-BarcelonaHonours-14"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FIFA" title="FIFA">FIFA</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-FIFAHonours_15-0" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-FIFAHonours-15"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>12<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Major_League_Soccer" title="Major League Soccer">Major League Soccer</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-MLS.com_16-0" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-MLS.com-16"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>13<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Royal_Spanish_Football_Federation" title="Royal Spanish Football Federation">Royal Spanish Football Federation</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-17" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-17"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>14<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> and multiple media outlets,<sup id="cite_ref-18" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-18"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>15<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-19" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-19"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>16<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-20" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-20"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>17<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Messi also won the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2005_Supercopa_de_Espa%C3%B1a" title="2005 Supercopa de España">2005 Supercopa de España</a>, bringing his Barcelona trophy total to 35 and his career total to 46.<sup id="cite_ref-21" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-21"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>18<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> However, this particular trophy is not credited here since Messi was out of the squad and did not feature in any of the two games against <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Real_Betis" title="Real Betis">Real Betis</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-FirstMiami_22-0" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-FirstMiami-22"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>19<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-ElGrafico_23-0" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-ElGrafico-23"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>20<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1239543626"><div class="reflist reflist-lower-greek"><div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-U23-2"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_ref-U23_2-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_ref-U23_2-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text">Does not include an <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Non-FIFA_international_football" title="Non-FIFA international football">unofficial friendly match</a> played on 24 May 2008 in Barcelona between Argentina U23 and the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catalonia_national_football_team" title="Catalonia national football team">Catalonia national football team</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-454" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-454"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>437<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-455" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-455"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>438<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> as Catalonia is not affiliated with either <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FIFA" title="FIFA">FIFA</a> or <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UEFA" title="UEFA">UEFA</a> as a <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_men%27s_national_association_football_teams" title="List of men&#39;s national association football teams">national member association</a> and is therefore not allowed to participate in official competitions.<sup id="cite_ref-456" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_note-456"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>439<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>

<li id="cite_note-8"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_ref-8" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFLacombe2016" class="citation web cs1 cs1-prop-foreign-lang-source">Lacombe, Rémy (11 January 2016). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.francefootball.fr/news/messi-le-cinquieme-element/623615">"Messi, le Cinquième Élément"</a> [Messi, the Fifth Element]. <i>France Football</i> (in French). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20240121175932/https://www.francefootball.fr/news/messi-le-cinquieme-element/623615">Archived</a> from the original on 21 January 2024<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">21 January</span> 2024</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.jtitle=France+Football&amp;rft.atitle=Messi%2C+le+Cinqui%C3%A8me+%C3%89l%C3%A9ment&amp;rft.date=2016-01-11&amp;rft.aulast=Lacombe&amp;rft.aufirst=R%C3%A9my&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.francefootball.fr%2Fnews%2Fmessi-le-cinquieme-element%2F623615&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ALionel+Messi" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-336"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Messi#cite_ref-336" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite class="citation web cs1 cs1-prop-foreign-lang-source"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.stheadline.com/realtime-china/3315776/%E7%BE%8E%E6%96%AF%E9%A2%A8%E6%B3%A2%E5%85%A7%E5%9C%B0%E6%8E%80%E6%8A%B5%E5%88%B6%E6%BD%AE-%E5%AE%98%E5%AA%92%E7%B1%B2%E5%86%B7%E9%9D%9C%E5%BC%84%E6%B8%85%E6%A5%9A%E5%90%88%E5%90%8C%E7%B4%B0%E7%AF%80">"美斯風波︱內地掀抵制潮 官媒籲冷靜弄清楚合同細節"</a> [Boycott Messi on Chinese trend; state-run media urge for calm]. <i>Sing Tao Daily</i> (in Chinese (Hong Kong)). 9 February 2024. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20240214153103/https://www.stheadline.com/realtime-china/3315776/%E7%BE%8E%E6%96%AF%E9%A2%A8%E6%B3%A2%E5%85%A7%E5%9C%B0%E6%8E%80%E6%8A%B5%E5%88%B6%E6%BD%AE-%E5%AE%98%E5%AA%92%E7%B1%B2%E5%86%B7%E9%9D%9C%E5%BC%84%E6%B8%85%E6%A5%9A%E5%90%88%E5%90%8C%E7%B4%B0%E7%AF%80">Archived</a> from the original on 14 February 2024<span class="reference-accessdate">. <ul><li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1982_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1982 FIFA World Cup">1982</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Italy_national_football_team" title="Italy national football team"><img alt="Italy national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Italy.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/03/Flag_of_Italy.svg/40px-Flag_of_Italy.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1500" data-file-height="1000"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paolo_Rossi" title="Paolo Rossi">Rossi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1986_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1986 FIFA World Cup">1986</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diego_Maradona" title="Diego Maradona">Maradona</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1990_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1990 FIFA World Cup">1990</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Italy_national_football_team" title="Italy national football team"><img alt="Italy national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Italy.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/03/Flag_of_Italy.svg/40px-Flag_of_Italy.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1500" data-file-height="1000"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Salvatore_Schillaci" title="Salvatore Schillaci">Schillaci</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1994_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1994 FIFA World Cup">1994</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rom%C3%A1rio" title="Romário">Romário</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1998_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1998 FIFA World Cup">1998</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ronaldo_(Brazilian_footballer)" title="Ronaldo (Brazilian footballer)">Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2002_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2002 FIFA World Cup">2002</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germany_national_football_team" title="Germany national football team"><img alt="Germany national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Germany.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/ba/Flag_of_Germany.svg/40px-Flag_of_Germany.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oliver_Kahn" title="Oliver Kahn">Kahn</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2006_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2006 FIFA World Cup">2006</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France_national_football_team" title="France national football team"><img alt="France national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/40px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zinedine_Zidane" title="Zinedine Zidane">Zidane</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2010_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2010 FIFA World Cup">2010</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uruguay_national_football_team" title="Uruguay national football team"><img alt="Uruguay national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg/40px-Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="512" data-file-height="341"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diego_Forl%C3%A1n" title="Diego Forlán">Forlán</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2014_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2014 FIFA World Cup">2014</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2018 FIFA World Cup">2018</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Croatia_national_football_team" title="Croatia national football team"><img alt="Croatia national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Croatia.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="8" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1b/Flag_of_Croatia.svg/40px-Flag_of_Croatia.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1200" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luka_Modri%C4%87" title="Luka Modrić">Modrić</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2022_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2022 FIFA World Cup">2022</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2010_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2010 FIFA World Cup">2010</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spain_national_football_team" title="Spain national football team"><img alt="Spain national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Spain.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/9/9a/Flag_of_Spain.svg/40px-Flag_of_Spain.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="750" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Iker_Casillas" title="Iker Casillas">Casillas</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2014_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2014 FIFA World Cup">2014</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germany_national_football_team" title="Germany national football team"><img alt="Germany national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Germany.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/ba/Flag_of_Germany.svg/40px-Flag_of_Germany.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Philipp_Lahm" title="Philipp Lahm">Lahm</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2018 FIFA World Cup">2018</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France_national_football_team" title="France national football team"><img alt="France national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/40px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hugo_Lloris" title="Hugo Lloris">Lloris</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2022_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2022 FIFA World Cup">2022</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1919_South_American_Championship" title="1919 South American Championship">1919</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil_(1889–1960).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/92/Flag_of_Brazil_%281889%E2%80%931960%29.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil_%281889%E2%80%931960%29.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arthur_Friedenreich" title="Arthur Friedenreich">Friedenreich</a> &amp; <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil_(1889–1960).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/92/Flag_of_Brazil_%281889%E2%80%931960%29.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil_%281889%E2%80%931960%29.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Neco" title="Neco">Neco</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1927_South_American_Championship" title="1927 South American Championship">1927</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - <ul><li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1975_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1975 Copa América">1975</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colombia_national_football_team" title="Colombia national football team"><img alt="Colombia national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Colombia.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/21/Flag_of_Colombia.svg/40px-Flag_of_Colombia.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ernesto_D%C3%ADaz" title="Ernesto Díaz">E. <li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1983_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1983 Copa América">1983</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uruguay_national_football_team" title="Uruguay national football team"><img alt="Uruguay national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg/40px-Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="512" data-file-height="341"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carlos_Aguilera_(Uruguayan_footballer)" title="Carlos Aguilera (Uruguayan footballer)">Aguilera</a>, <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jorge_Burruchaga" title="Jorge Burruchaga">Burruchaga</a> &amp;  <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil_(1968–1992).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/2e/Flag_of_Brazil_%281968%E2%80%931992%29.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil_%281968%E2%80%931992%29.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roberto_Dinamite" title="Roberto Dinamite">Dinamite</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1987_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1987 Copa América">1987</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colombia_national_football_team" title="Colombia national football team"><img alt="Colombia national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Colombia.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/21/Flag_of_Colombia.svg/40px-Flag_of_Colombia.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arnoldo_Iguar%C3%A1n" title="Arnoldo Iguarán">Iguarán</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1989_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1989 Copa América">1989</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil_(1968–1992).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/2e/Flag_of_Brazil_%281968%E2%80%931992%29.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil_%281968%E2%80%931992%29.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bebeto" title="Bebeto">Bebeto</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1991_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1991 Copa América">1991</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gabriel_Batistuta" title="Gabriel Batistuta">Batistuta</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1993_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1993 Copa América">1993</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Venezuela_national_football_team" title="Venezuela national football team"><img alt="Venezuela national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Venezuela_(1930–2006).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/ef/Flag_of_Venezuela_%281930%E2%80%932006%29.svg/40px-Flag_of_Venezuela_%281930%E2%80%932006%29.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jos%C3%A9_Luis_Dolgetta" title="José Luis Dolgetta">Dolgetta</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1995_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1995 Copa América">1995</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gabriel_Batistuta" title="Gabriel Batistuta">Batistuta</a> &amp; <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mexico_national_football_team" title="Mexico national football team"><img alt="Mexico national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fc/Flag_of_Mexico.svg/40px-Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="980" data-file-height="560"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luis_Garc%C3%ADa_(footballer,_born_1969)" title="Luis García (footballer, born 1969)">García</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1997_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1997 Copa América">1997</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mexico_national_football_team" title="Mexico national football team"><img alt="Mexico national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fc/Flag_of_Mexico.svg/40px-Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="980" data-file-height="560"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luis_Hern%C3%A1ndez_(footballer,_born_1968)" title="Luis Hernández (footballer, born 1968)">Hernández</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1999_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1999 Copa América">1999</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rivaldo" title="Rivaldo">Rivaldo</a> &amp; <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ronaldo_(Brazilian_footballer)" title="Ronaldo (Brazilian footballer)">Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2001_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2001 Copa América">2001</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colombia_national_football_team" title="Colombia national football team"><img alt="Colombia national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Colombia.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/21/Flag_of_Colombia.svg/40px-Flag_of_Colombia.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/V%C3%ADctor_Aristiz%C3%A1bal" title="Víctor Aristizábal">Aristizábal</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2004_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2004 Copa América">2004</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adriano_(footballer,_born_February_1982)" title="Adriano (footballer, born February 1982)">Adriano</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2007_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2007 Copa América">2007</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robinho" title="Robinho">Robinho</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2011_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2011 Copa América">2011</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peru_national_football_team" title="Peru national football team"><img alt="Peru national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Peru.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/cf/Flag_of_Peru.svg/40px-Flag_of_Peru.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paolo_Guerrero" title="Paolo Guerrero">Guerrero</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2015_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2015 Copa América">2015</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peru_national_football_team" title="Peru national football team"><img alt="Peru national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Peru.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/cf/Flag_of_Peru.svg/40px-Flag_of_Peru.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paolo_Guerrero" title="Paolo Guerrero">Guerrero</a> &amp; <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chile_national_football_team" title="Chile national football team"><img alt="Chile national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Chile.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Flag_of_Chile.svg/40px-Flag_of_Chile.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eduardo_Vargas" title="Eduardo Vargas">Vargas</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Copa_Am%C3%A9rica_Centenario" title="Copa América Centenario">2016</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chile_national_football_team" title="Chile national football team"><img alt="Chile national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Chile.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Flag_of_Chile.svg/40px-Flag_of_Chile.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eduardo_Vargas" title="Eduardo Vargas">Vargas</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2019_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2019 Copa América">2019</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Everton_Soares" title="Everton Soares">Everton</a> &amp; <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peru_national_football_team" title="Peru national football team"><img alt="Peru national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Peru.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/cf/Flag_of_Peru.svg/40px-Flag_of_Peru.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paolo_Guerrero" title="Paolo Guerrero">Guerrero</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2021_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2021 Copa América">2021</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colombia_national_football_team" title="Colombia national football team"><img alt="Colombia national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Colombia.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/21/Flag_of_Colombia.svg/40px-Flag_of_Colombia.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luis_D%C3%ADaz_(footballer,_born_1997)" title="Luis Díaz (footballer, born 1997)">L. <ul><li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1916_South_American_Championship" title="1916 South American Championship">1916</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uruguay_national_football_team" title="Uruguay national football team"><img alt="Uruguay national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg/40px-Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="512" data-file-height="341"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Isabelino_Grad%C3%ADn" title="Isabelino Gradín">Gradín</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1979_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1979 Copa América">1979</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chile_national_football_team" title="Chile national football team"><img alt="Chile national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Chile.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Flag_of_Chile.svg/40px-Flag_of_Chile.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carlos_Caszely" title="Carlos Caszely">Caszely</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1983_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1983 Copa América">1983</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uruguay_national_football_team" title="Uruguay national football team"><img alt="Uruguay national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg/40px-Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="512" data-file-height="341"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Enzo_Francescoli" title="Enzo Francescoli">Francescoli</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr style="display: none;"><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;;width:1%">Official award</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">

<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2015_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2015 Copa América">2015</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a><sup>1</sup></span></li>

Rodríguez</a></span></li></ul>

<li><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1989_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1989 Copa América">1989</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ricardo_Gomes" title="Ricardo Gomes">Ricardo Gomes</a></li>
<li><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1991_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1991 Copa América">1991</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oscar_Ruggeri" title="Oscar Ruggeri">Ruggeri</a></li>
<li><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1993_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1993 Copa América">1993</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oscar_Ruggeri" title="Oscar Ruggeri">Ruggeri</a></li>
<li><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1995_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1995 Copa América">1995</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uruguay_national_football_team" title="Uruguay national football team"><img alt="Uruguay national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg/40px-Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="512" data-file-height="341"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Enzo_Francescoli" title="Enzo Francescoli">Francescoli</a></li>
<li><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1997_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1997 Copa América">1997</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dunga" title="Dunga">Dunga</a></li>
<li><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1999_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="1999 Copa América">1999</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rivaldo" title="Rivaldo">Rivaldo</a></li>
<li><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2001_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2001 Copa América">2001</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colombia_national_football_team" title="Colombia national football team"><img alt="Colombia national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Colombia.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/21/Flag_of_Colombia.svg/40px-Flag_of_Colombia.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Iv%C3%A1n_C%C3%B3rdoba" title="Iván Córdoba">Córdoba</a></li>
<li><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2004_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2004 Copa América">2004</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alex_(footballer,_born_1977)" title="Alex (footballer, born 1977)">Alex</a></li>
<li><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2007_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2007 Copa América">2007</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gilberto_Silva" title="Gilberto Silva">Gilberto Silva</a></li>
<li><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2011_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2011 Copa América">2011</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uruguay_national_football_team" title="Uruguay national football team"><img alt="Uruguay national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg/40px-Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="512" data-file-height="341"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diego_Lugano" title="Diego Lugano">Lugano</a></li>
<li><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2015_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2015 Copa América">2015</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chile_national_football_team" title="Chile national football team"><img alt="Chile national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Chile.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Flag_of_Chile.svg/40px-Flag_of_Chile.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Claudio_Bravo" title="Claudio Bravo">Bravo</a></li>
<li><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Copa_Am%C3%A9rica_Centenario" title="Copa América Centenario">2016</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chile_national_football_team" title="Chile national football team"><img alt="Chile national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Chile.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Flag_of_Chile.svg/40px-Flag_of_Chile.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Claudio_Bravo" title="Claudio Bravo">Bravo</a></li>
<li><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2019_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2019 Copa América">2019</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dani_Alves" title="Dani Alves">Alves</a></li>
<li><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2021_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2021 Copa América">2021</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></li>
<li><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2024_Copa_Am%C3%A9rica" title="2024 Copa América">2024</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></li></ul>
