<ul><li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1977_FIFA_World_Youth_Championship" title="1977 FIFA World Youth Championship">1977</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guina" title="Guina">Guina</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1979_FIFA_World_Youth_Championship" title="1979 FIFA World Youth Championship">1979</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ram%C3%B3n_D%C3%ADaz" title="Ramón Díaz">Díaz</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1981_FIFA_World_Youth_Championship" title="1981 FIFA World Youth Championship">1981</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_Koussas" title="Mark Koussas">Koussas</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1983_FIFA_World_Youth_Championship" title="1983 FIFA World Youth Championship">1983</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geovani_Faria_da_Silva" class="mw-redirect" title="Geovani Faria da Silva">Geovani</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1985_FIFA_World_Youth_Championship" title="1985 FIFA World Youth Championship">1985</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sebasti%C3%A1n_Losada" title="Sebastián Losada">Losada</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1987_FIFA_World_Youth_Championship" title="1987 FIFA World Youth Championship">1987</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marcel_Witeczek" title="Marcel Witeczek">Witeczek</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1989_FIFA_World_Youth_Championship" title="1989 FIFA World Youth Championship">1989</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oleg_Salenko" title="Oleg Salenko">Salenko</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1991_FIFA_World_Youth_Championship" title="1991 FIFA World Youth Championship">1991</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Serhiy_Scherbakov" class="mw-redirect" title="Serhiy Scherbakov">Scherbakov</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1993_FIFA_World_Youth_Championship" title="1993 FIFA World Youth Championship">1993</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_Zambrano" title="Henry Zambrano">Zambrano</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1995_FIFA_World_Youth_Championship" title="1995 FIFA World Youth Championship">1995</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseba_Etxeberria" title="Joseba Etxeberria">Etxeberria</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1997_FIFA_World_Youth_Championship" title="1997 FIFA World Youth Championship">1997</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ada%C3%ADlton_(footballer,_born_1977)" title="Adaílton (footballer, born 1977)">Adaílton</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1999_FIFA_World_Youth_Championship" title="1999 FIFA World Youth Championship">1999</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pablo_Cou%C3%B1ago" title="Pablo Couñago">Couñago</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2001_FIFA_World_Youth_Championship" title="2001 FIFA World Youth Championship">2001</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Javier_Saviola" title="Javier Saviola">Saviola</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2003_FIFA_World_Youth_Championship" title="2003 FIFA World Youth Championship">2003</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eddie_Johnson_(American_soccer)" title="Eddie Johnson (American soccer)">Johnson</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2005_FIFA_World_Youth_Championship" title="2005 FIFA World Youth Championship">2005</a>: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2007_FIFA_U-20_World_Cup" title="2007 FIFA U-20 World Cup">2007</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sergio_Ag%C3%BCero" title="Sergio Agüero">Agüero</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2009_FIFA_U-20_World_Cup" title="2009 FIFA U-20 World Cup">2009</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dominic_Adiyiah" title="Dominic Adiyiah">Adiyiah</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2011_FIFA_U-20_World_Cup" title="2011 FIFA U-20 World Cup">2011</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henrique_Almeida" title="Henrique Almeida">Henrique</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2013_FIFA_U-20_World_Cup" title="2013 FIFA U-20 World Cup">2013</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ebenezer_Assifuah" title="Ebenezer Assifuah">Assifuah</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2015_FIFA_U-20_World_Cup" title="2015 FIFA U-20 World Cup">2015</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Viktor_Kovalenko_(footballer)" title="Viktor Kovalenko (footballer)">Kovalenko</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2017_FIFA_U-20_World_Cup" title="2017 FIFA U-20 World Cup">2017</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Riccardo_Orsolini" title="Riccardo Orsolini">Orsolini</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2019_FIFA_U-20_World_Cup" title="2019 FIFA U-20 World Cup">2019</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erling_Haaland" title="Erling Haaland">Haaland</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2023_FIFA_U-20_World_Cup" title="2023 FIFA U-20 World Cup">2023</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cesare_Casadei" title="Cesare Casadei">Casadei</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr style="display: none;"><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%;background: gold;">Golden Glove</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2009_FIFA_U-20_World_Cup" title="2009 FIFA U-20 World Cup">2009</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Esteban_Alvarado" title="Esteban Alvarado">Alvarado</a> </span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2015_FIFA_U-20_World_Cup" title="2015 FIFA U-20 World Cup">2015</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Predrag_Rajkovi%C4%87" title="Predrag Rajković">Rajković</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2017_FIFA_U-20_World_Cup" title="2017 FIFA U-20 World Cup">2017</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freddie_Woodman" title="Freddie Woodman">Woodman</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2019_FIFA_U-20_World_Cup" title="2019 FIFA U-20 World Cup">2019</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andriy_Lunin" title="Andriy Lunin">Lunin</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2023_FIFA_U-20_World_Cup" title="2023 FIFA U-20 World Cup">2023</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sebastiano_Desplanches" title="Sebastiano Desplanches">Desplanches</a></span></li></ul>

<ul><li><i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France_Football" title="France Football">France Football</a></i> magazine award</li></ul>

<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Best_FIFA_Football_Awards_2018" title="The Best FIFA Football Awards 2018">2018</a>: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Croatia_national_football_team" title="Croatia national football team"><img alt="Croatia national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Croatia.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="8" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1b/Flag_of_Croatia.svg/40px-Flag_of_Croatia.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1200" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luka_Modri%C4%87" title="Luka Modrić">Modrić</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Best_FIFA_Football_Awards_2019" title="The Best FIFA Football Awards 2019">2019</a>: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Best_FIFA_Football_Awards_2020" title="The Best FIFA Football Awards 2020">2020</a>: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Poland_national_football_team" title="Poland national football team"><img alt="Poland national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Poland.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/1/12/Flag_of_Poland.svg/40px-Flag_of_Poland.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="800"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Lewandowski" title="Robert Lewandowski">Lewandowski</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Best_FIFA_Football_Awards_2021" title="The Best FIFA Football Awards 2021">2021</a>: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Poland_national_football_team" title="Poland national football team"><img alt="Poland national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Poland.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/1/12/Flag_of_Poland.svg/40px-Flag_of_Poland.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="800"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Lewandowski" title="Robert Lewandowski">Lewandowski</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Best_FIFA_Football_Awards_2022" title="The Best FIFA Football Awards 2022">2022</a>: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Best_FIFA_Football_Awards_2023" title="The Best FIFA Football Awards 2023">2023</a>: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Best_FIFA_Football_Awards_2024" title="The Best FIFA Football Awards 2024">2024</a>: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vin%C3%ADcius_J%C3%BAnior" title="Vinícius Júnior">Vinícius</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr style="display: none;"><td class="navbox-abovebelow" colspan="2" style="background: gold;"><div>

<div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1236075235"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Globe_Soccer_Awards_Best_Player86" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner mw-made-collapsible mw-collapsed" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background:gold; color:Gold (color)"><button type="button" class="mw-collapsible-toggle mw-collapsible-toggle-default mw-collapsible-toggle-collapsed" aria-expanded="false" tabindex="0" style="color: inherit;"><span class="mw-collapsible-text" style="color: inherit;">show</span></button><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1239400231"><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Template:Globe_Soccer_Awards_best_Player" title="Template:Globe Soccer Awards best Player"><abbr title="View this template" style="color:Gold (color)">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Template_talk:Globe_Soccer_Awards_best_Player" title="Template talk:Globe Soccer Awards best Player"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style="color:Gold (color)">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:EditPage/Template:Globe_Soccer_Awards_best_Player" title="Special:EditPage/Template:Globe Soccer Awards best Player"><abbr title="Edit this template" style="color:Gold (color)">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Globe_Soccer_Awards_Best_Player86" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Globe_Soccer_Awards#Best_Player_of_the_Year_Award" title="Globe Soccer Awards">Globe Soccer Awards Best Player</a></div></th></tr><tr style="display: none;"><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em"><b>Men's winners</b><br>
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">2011: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portugal_national_football_team" title="Portugal national football team"><img alt="Portugal national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/40px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="600" data-file-height="400"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2012: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colombia_national_football_team" title="Colombia national football team"><img alt="Colombia national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Colombia.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/21/Flag_of_Colombia.svg/40px-Flag_of_Colombia.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Radamel_Falcao" title="Radamel Falcao">Falcao</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2013: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France_national_football_team" title="France national football team"><img alt="France national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/40px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Franck_Rib%C3%A9ry" title="Franck Ribéry">Ribéry</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2014: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portugal_national_football_team" title="Portugal national football team"><img alt="Portugal national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/40px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="600" data-file-height="400"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2015: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2016: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portugal_national_football_team" title="Portugal national football team"><img alt="Portugal national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/40px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="600" data-file-height="400"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2017: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portugal_national_football_team" title="Portugal national football team"><img alt="Portugal national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/40px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="600" data-file-height="400"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2018: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portugal_national_football_team" title="Portugal national football team"><img alt="Portugal national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/40px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="600" data-file-height="400"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">Ronaldo</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2024: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vin%C3%ADcius_J%C3%BAnior" title="Vinícius Júnior">Vinícius Jr.</a></span></li></ul></div></td></tr><tr style="display: none;"><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em"><b>Women's winners</b><br>

<li><span class="nowrap">2023: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Norway" title="Norway"><img alt="Norway" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Norway.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d9/Flag_of_Norway.svg/40px-Flag_of_Norway.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="512" data-file-height="372"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erling_Haaland" title="Erling Haaland">Haaland</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2022: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spain" title="Spain"><img alt="Spain" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Spain.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/9/9a/Flag_of_Spain.svg/40px-Flag_of_Spain.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="750" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alexia_Putellas" title="Alexia Putellas">Putellas</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2023: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spain" title="Spain"><img alt="Spain" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Spain.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/9/9a/Flag_of_Spain.svg/40px-Flag_of_Spain.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="750" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aitana_Bonmat%C3%AD" title="Aitana Bonmatí">Bonmatí</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2024: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spain" title="Spain"><img alt="Spain" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Spain.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/9/9a/Flag_of_Spain.svg/40px-Flag_of_Spain.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="750" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aitana_Bonmat%C3%AD" title="Aitana Bonmatí">Bonmatí</a></span></li></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<dl><dt><span class="nowrap">Men's winners</span></dt></dl>
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1991: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France_national_football_team" title="France national football team"><img alt="France national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/40px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean-Pierre_Papin" title="Jean-Pierre Papin">Papin</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1992: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Netherlands_national_football_team" title="Netherlands national football team"><img alt="Netherlands national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/40px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dennis_Bergkamp" title="Dennis Bergkamp">Bergkamp</a> &amp; <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ra%C3%AD" title="Raí">Raí</a> &amp; <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Honduras_national_football_team" title="Honduras national football team"><img alt="Honduras national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Honduras_(2022-).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="8" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/85/Flag_of_Honduras_%282022-%29.svg/40px-Flag_of_Honduras_%282022-%29.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1200" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/C%C3%A9sar_Obando" title="César Obando">Obando</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1993: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saudi_Arabia_national_football_team" title="Saudi Arabia national football team"><img alt="Saudi Arabia national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Saudi_Arabia.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/0d/Flag_of_Saudi_Arabia.svg/40px-Flag_of_Saudi_Arabia.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saeed_Al-Owairan" title="Saeed Al-Owairan">Al-Owairan</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1994: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bulgaria_national_football_team" title="Bulgaria national football team"><img alt="Bulgaria national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Bulgaria.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9a/Flag_of_Bulgaria.svg/40px-Flag_of_Bulgaria.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hristo_Stoichkov" title="Hristo Stoichkov">Stoichkov</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1995: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germany_national_football_team" title="Germany national football team"><img alt="Germany national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Germany.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/ba/Flag_of_Germany.svg/40px-Flag_of_Germany.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J%C3%BCrgen_Klinsmann" title="Jürgen Klinsmann">Klinsmann</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1996: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Iran_national_football_team" title="Iran national football team"><img alt="Iran national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Iran.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/ca/Flag_of_Iran.svg/40px-Flag_of_Iran.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="630" data-file-height="360"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ali_Daei" title="Ali Daei">Daei</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2021: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Czech_Republic" title="Czech Republic"><img alt="Czech Republic" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_the_Czech_Republic.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/cb/Flag_of_the_Czech_Republic.svg/40px-Flag_of_the_Czech_Republic.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lucie_Mart%C3%ADnkov%C3%A1" title="Lucie Martínková">Martínková</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2022: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States" title="United States"><img alt="United States" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="8" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/40px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1235" data-file-height="650"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mia_Fishel" title="Mia Fishel">Fishel</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2023: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mexico" title="Mexico"><img alt="Mexico" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fc/Flag_of_Mexico.svg/40px-Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="980" data-file-height="560"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charlyn_Corral" title="Charlyn Corral">Corral</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2024: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mexico" title="Mexico"><img alt="Mexico" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fc/Flag_of_Mexico.svg/40px-Flag_of_Mexico.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="980" data-file-height="560"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charlyn_Corral" title="Charlyn Corral">Corral</a></span></li></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1976: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Netherlands_national_football_team" title="Netherlands national football team"><img alt="Netherlands national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/40px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rob_Rensenbrink" title="Rob Rensenbrink">Rensenbrink</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1977: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/England_national_football_team" title="England national football team"><img alt="England national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_England.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/40px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kevin_Keegan" title="Kevin Keegan">Keegan</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">1991: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France_national_football_team" title="France national football team"><img alt="France national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/40px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean-Pierre_Papin" title="Jean-Pierre Papin">Papin</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1992: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bulgaria_national_football_team" title="Bulgaria national football team"><img alt="Bulgaria national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Bulgaria.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9a/Flag_of_Bulgaria.svg/40px-Flag_of_Bulgaria.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hristo_Stoichkov" title="Hristo Stoichkov">Stoichkov</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1993: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Italy_national_football_team" title="Italy national football team"><img alt="Italy national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Italy.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/03/Flag_of_Italy.svg/40px-Flag_of_Italy.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1500" data-file-height="1000"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roberto_Baggio" title="Roberto Baggio">Baggio</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1994: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rom%C3%A1rio" title="Romário">Romário</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1995: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Liberia_national_football_team" title="Liberia national football team"><img alt="Liberia national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Liberia.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="8" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b8/Flag_of_Liberia.svg/40px-Flag_of_Liberia.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1140" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Weah" title="George Weah">Weah</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1996: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France_national_football_team" title="France national football team"><img alt="France national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/40px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eric_Cantona" title="Eric Cantona">Cantona</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1997: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ronaldo_(Brazilian_footballer)" title="Ronaldo (Brazilian footballer)">Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1998: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France_national_football_team" title="France national football team"><img alt="France national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/40px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zinedine_Zidane" title="Zinedine Zidane">Zidane</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1999: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rivaldo" title="Rivaldo">Rivaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2000: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France_national_football_team" title="France national football team"><img alt="France national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/40px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zinedine_Zidane" title="Zinedine Zidane">Zidane</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2001: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France_national_football_team" title="France national football team"><img alt="France national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/40px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zinedine_Zidane" title="Zinedine Zidane">Zidane</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2002: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ronaldo_(Brazilian_footballer)" title="Ronaldo (Brazilian footballer)">Ronaldo</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2004: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ivory_Coast_national_football_team" title="Ivory Coast national football team"><img alt="Ivory Coast national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Côte_d&#39;Ivoire.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Flag_of_C%C3%B4te_d%27Ivoire.svg/40px-Flag_of_C%C3%B4te_d%27Ivoire.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Didier_Drogba" title="Didier Drogba">Drogba</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2005: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ronaldinho" title="Ronaldinho">Ronaldinho</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2008: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portugal_national_football_team" title="Portugal national football team"><img alt="Portugal national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/40px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="600" data-file-height="400"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">C. Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2009: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2010–11: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2011–12: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2012–14: <em style="color:#707070">not awarded</em></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2014–15: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France_national_football_team" title="France national football team"><img alt="France national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/40px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antoine_Griezmann" title="Antoine Griezmann">Griezmann</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2015–16: <em style="color:#707070">not awarded</em></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2016–17: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portugal_national_football_team" title="Portugal national football team"><img alt="Portugal national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/40px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="600" data-file-height="400"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">C. Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2017–18: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2018–19: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Senegal_national_football_team" title="Senegal national football team"><img alt="Senegal national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Senegal.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fd/Flag_of_Senegal.svg/40px-Flag_of_Senegal.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sadio_Man%C3%A9" title="Sadio Mané">Mané</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2019–20: <em style="color:#707070">not awarded</em></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2020–21: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France_national_football_team" title="France national football team"><img alt="France national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/40px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Karim_Benzema" title="Karim Benzema">Benzema</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2021–22: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France_national_football_team" title="France national football team"><img alt="France national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/40px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Karim_Benzema" title="Karim Benzema">Benzema</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2022–23: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Norway_national_football_team" title="Norway national football team"><img alt="Norway national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Norway.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d9/Flag_of_Norway.svg/40px-Flag_of_Norway.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="512" data-file-height="372"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erling_Haaland" title="Erling Haaland">Haaland</a></span></li></ul>

<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1997–98: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ronaldo_(Brazilian_footballer)" title="Ronaldo (Brazilian footballer)">Ronaldo</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1998–99: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/England_national_football_team" title="England national football team"><img alt="England national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_England.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/40px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Beckham" title="David Beckham">Beckham</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1999–2000: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fernando_Redondo" title="Fernando Redondo">Redondo</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2000–01: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germany_national_football_team" title="Germany national football team"><img alt="Germany national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Germany.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/ba/Flag_of_Germany.svg/40px-Flag_of_Germany.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stefan_Effenberg" title="Stefan Effenberg">Effenberg</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2001–02: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France_national_football_team" title="France national football team"><img alt="France national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/40px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zinedine_Zidane" title="Zinedine Zidane">Zidane</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2002–03: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Italy_national_football_team" title="Italy national football team"><img alt="Italy national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Italy.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/03/Flag_of_Italy.svg/40px-Flag_of_Italy.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1500" data-file-height="1000"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gianluigi_Buffon" title="Gianluigi Buffon">Buffon</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2003–04: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portugal_national_football_team" title="Portugal national football team"><img alt="Portugal national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/40px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="600" data-file-height="400"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deco" title="Deco">Deco</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2004–05: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/England_national_football_team" title="England national football team"><img alt="England national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_England.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/40px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steven_Gerrard" title="Steven Gerrard">Gerrard</a> </span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2008–09: <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a> </span></li>

<li>2008–09: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edwin_van_der_Sar" title="Edwin van der Sar">Van der Sar</a></li>
<li>2009–10: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J%C3%BAlio_C%C3%A9sar_(football_goalkeeper,_born_1979)" title="Júlio César (football goalkeeper, born 1979)">Júlio César</a></li>
<li>2010–16: <i>Not awarded</i></li>

</div></td></tr><tr style="display: none;"><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;;width:1%">Best Defender</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li>1997–98: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fernando_Hierro" title="Fernando Hierro">Hierro</a></li>
<li>1998–99: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jaap_Stam" title="Jaap Stam">Stam</a></li>
<li>1999–2000: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jaap_Stam" title="Jaap Stam">Stam</a></li>
<li>2000–01: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roberto_Ayala" title="Roberto Ayala">Ayala</a></li>
<li>2001–02: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roberto_Carlos" title="Roberto Carlos">Roberto Carlos</a></li>
<li>2002–03: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roberto_Carlos" title="Roberto Carlos">Roberto Carlos</a></li>

<li>2004–05: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Terry" title="John Terry">Terry</a></li>
<li>2005–06: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carles_Puyol" title="Carles Puyol">Puyol</a></li>
<li>2006–07: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paolo_Maldini" title="Paolo Maldini">Maldini</a></li>
<li>2007–08: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Terry" title="John Terry">Terry</a></li>
<li>2008–09: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Terry" title="John Terry">Terry</a></li>
<li>2009–10: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maicon_(footballer,_born_1981)" title="Maicon (footballer, born 1981)">Maicon</a></li>
<li>2010–16: <i>Not awarded</i></li>
<li>2016–17: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sergio_Ramos" title="Sergio Ramos">Ramos</a></li>
<li>2017–18: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sergio_Ramos" title="Sergio Ramos">Ramos</a></li>
<li>2018–19: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Virgil_van_Dijk" title="Virgil van Dijk">Van Dijk</a></li>

<li>2020–21: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/R%C3%BAben_Dias" title="Rúben Dias">Dias</a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr style="display: none;"><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;;width:1%">Best Midfielder</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">

Alfredo Di Stéfano">Trofeo Alfredo Di Stéfano</a></div></th></tr><tr style="display: none;"><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li>2007–08: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ra%C3%BAl_(footballer)" title="Raúl (footballer)">Raúl</a></li>
<li>2008–09: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></li>
<li>2009–10: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></li>
<li>2010–11: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></li>

<li>2012–13: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">Ronaldo</a></li>
<li>2013–14: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">Ronaldo</a></li>
<li>2014–15: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></li>
<li>2015–16: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">Ronaldo</a></li>
<li>2016–17: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></li>
<li>2017–18: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></li>
<li>2018–19: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></li>
<li>2019–20: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Karim_Benzema" title="Karim Benzema">Benzema</a></li>
<li>2020–21: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luis_Su%C3%A1rez" title="Luis Suárez">Suárez</a></li>
<li>2021–22: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Karim_Benzema" title="Karim Benzema">Benzema</a></li>
<li>2022–23: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marc-Andr%C3%A9_ter_Stegen" title="Marc-André ter Stegen">Ter Stegen</a></li>
<li>2023–24: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vin%C3%ADcius_J%C3%BAnior" title="Vinícius Júnior">Vinícius Jr.</a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1236075235"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Landon_Donovan_MVP_Award28" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner mw-made-collapsible mw-collapsed" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background-color:gold"><button type="button" class="mw-collapsible-toggle mw-collapsible-toggle-default mw-collapsible-toggle-collapsed" aria-expanded="false" tabindex="0" style="color: inherit;"><span class="mw-collapsible-text" style="color: inherit;">show</span></button><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link <ul><li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2000_FIFA_Club_World_Championship" title="2000 FIFA Club World Championship">2000</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ed%C3%ADlson" title="Edílson">Edílson</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2005_FIFA_Club_World_Championship" title="2005 FIFA Club World Championship">2005</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil national football team" src="./Lionel Messi - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rog%C3%A9rio_Ceni" title="Rogério Ceni">Rogério Ceni</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">1995–96: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zviad_Endeladze" title="Zviad Endeladze">Endeladze</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr style="display: none;"><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/European_Sports_Media" title="European Sports Media">ESM</a> award</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1996–97: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ronaldo_(Brazilian_footballer)" title="Ronaldo (Brazilian footballer)">Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1997–98: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nikos_Machlas" title="Nikos Machlas">Machlas</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1998–99: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/M%C3%A1rio_Jardel" title="Mário Jardel">Jardel</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1999–2000: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kevin_Phillips_(English_footballer)" title="Kevin Phillips (English footballer)">Phillips</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2000–01: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henrik_Larsson" title="Henrik Larsson">Larsson</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2001–02: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/M%C3%A1rio_Jardel" title="Mário Jardel">Jardel</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2002–03: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roy_Makaay" title="Roy Makaay">Makaay</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2003–04: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thierry_Henry" title="Thierry Henry">Henry</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2004–05: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thierry_Henry" title="Thierry Henry">Henry</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diego_Forl%C3%A1n" title="Diego Forlán">Forlán</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2005–06: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luca_Toni" title="Luca Toni">Toni</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2006–07: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Francesco_Totti" title="Francesco Totti">Totti</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2007–08: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">C. Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2008–09: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diego_Forl%C3%A1n" title="Diego Forlán">Forlán</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2009–10: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2010–11: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">C. Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2011–12: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2012–13: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2013–14: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">C. Ronaldo</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luis_Su%C3%A1rez" title="Luis Suárez">Suárez</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2014–15: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">C. Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2015–16: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luis_Su%C3%A1rez" title="Luis Suárez">Suárez</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2016–17: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2017–18: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2018–19: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2019–20: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ciro_Immobile" title="Ciro Immobile">Immobile</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2020–21: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Lewandowski" title="Robert Lewandowski">Lewandowski</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2022–23: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erling_Haaland" title="Erling Haaland">Haaland</a></span></li>
