<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1955%E2%80%9356_European_Cup" title="1955–56 European Cup">1956</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Milo%C5%A1_Milutinovi%C4%87" title="Miloš Milutinović">Milutinović</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1956%E2%80%9357_European_Cup" title="1956–57 European Cup">1957</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dennis_Viollet" title="Dennis Viollet">Viollet</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1957%E2%80%9358_European_Cup" title="1957–58 European Cup">1958</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alfredo_Di_St%C3%A9fano" title="Alfredo Di Stéfano">Di Stéfano</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1958%E2%80%9359_European_Cup" title="1958–59 European Cup">1959</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Just_Fontaine" title="Just Fontaine">Fontaine</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1959%E2%80%9360_European_Cup" title="1959–60 European Cup">1960</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ferenc_Pusk%C3%A1s" title="Ferenc Puskás">Puskás</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1960%E2%80%9361_European_Cup" title="1960–61 European Cup">1961</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jos%C3%A9_%C3%81guas" title="José Águas">J. Águas</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1961%E2%80%9362_European_Cup" title="1961–62 European Cup">1962</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alfredo_Di_St%C3%A9fano" title="Alfredo Di Stéfano">Di Stéfano</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bent_L%C3%B8fqvist" title="Bent Løfqvist">Løfqvist</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ferenc_Pusk%C3%A1s" title="Ferenc Puskás">Puskás</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heinz_Strehl" title="Heinz Strehl">Strehl</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Justo_Tejada" title="Justo Tejada">Tejada</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1962%E2%80%9363_European_Cup" title="1962–63 European Cup">1963</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jos%C3%A9_Altafini" title="José Altafini">Altafini</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1963%E2%80%9364_European_Cup" title="1963–64 European Cup">1964</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vladica_Kova%C4%8Devi%C4%87" title="Vladica Kovačević">Kovačević</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sandro_Mazzola" title="Sandro Mazzola">Mazzola</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ferenc_Pusk%C3%A1s" title="Ferenc Puskás">Puskás</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1964%E2%80%9365_European_Cup" title="1964–65 European Cup">1965</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eus%C3%A9bio" title="Eusébio">Eusébio</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jos%C3%A9_Torres_(footballer,_born_1938)" title="José Torres (footballer, born 1938)">Torres</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1965%E2%80%9366_European_Cup" title="1965–66 European Cup">1966</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fl%C3%B3ri%C3%A1n_Albert" title="Flórián Albert">Albert</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eus%C3%A9bio" title="Eusébio">Eusébio</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1966%E2%80%9367_European_Cup" title="1966–67 European Cup">1967</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J%C3%BCrgen_Piepenburg" title="Jürgen Piepenburg">Piepenburg</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Van_Himst" title="Paul Van Himst">Van Himst</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1967%E2%80%9368_European_Cup" title="1967–68 European Cup">1968</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eus%C3%A9bio" title="Eusébio">Eusébio</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1968%E2%80%9369_European_Cup" title="1968–69 European Cup">1969</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Denis_Law" title="Denis Law">Law</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1969%E2%80%9370_European_Cup" title="1969–70 European Cup">1970</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mick_Jones_(footballer,_born_1945)" title="Mick Jones (footballer, born 1945)">Jones</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1970%E2%80%9371_European_Cup" title="1970–71 European Cup">1971</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antonis_Antoniadis" title="Antonis Antoniadis">Antoniadis</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1971%E2%80%9372_European_Cup" title="1971–72 European Cup">1972</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antal_Dunai" title="Antal Dunai">Dunai</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lou_Macari" title="Lou Macari">Macari</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Silvester_Taka%C4%8D" title="Silvester Takač">Takač</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1972%E2%80%9373_European_Cup" title="1972–73 European Cup">1973</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gerd_M%C3%BCller" title="Gerd Müller">Müller</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1973%E2%80%9374_European_Cup" title="1973–74 European Cup">1974</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gerd_M%C3%BCller" title="Gerd Müller">Müller</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1974%E2%80%9375_European_Cup" title="1974–75 European Cup">1975</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eduard_Markarov" title="Eduard Markarov">Markarov</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gerd_M%C3%BCller" title="Gerd Müller">Müller</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1975%E2%80%9376_European_Cup" title="1975–76 European Cup">1976</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jupp_Heynckes" title="Jupp Heynckes">Heynckes</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1976%E2%80%9377_European_Cup" title="1976–77 European Cup">1977</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Franco_Cucinotta" title="Franco Cucinotta">Cucinotta</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gerd_M%C3%BCller" title="Gerd Müller">Müller</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1977%E2%80%9378_European_Cup" title="1977–78 European Cup">1978</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Allan_Simonsen" title="Allan Simonsen">Simonsen</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1978%E2%80%9379_European_Cup" title="1978–79 European Cup">1979</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Claudio_Sulser" title="Claudio Sulser">Sulser</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1979%E2%80%9380_European_Cup" title="1979–80 European Cup">1980</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S%C3%B8ren_Lerby" title="Søren Lerby">Lerby</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1980%E2%80%9381_European_Cup" title="1980–81 European Cup">1981</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Terry_McDermott" title="Terry McDermott">McDermott</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Karl-Heinz_Rummenigge" title="Karl-Heinz Rummenigge">Rummenigge</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graeme_Souness" title="Graeme Souness">Souness</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1981%E2%80%9382_European_Cup" title="1981–82 European Cup">1982</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dieter_Hoene%C3%9F" title="Dieter Hoeneß">Hoeneß</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1982%E2%80%9383_European_Cup" title="1982–83 European Cup">1983</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paolo_Rossi" title="Paolo Rossi">Rossi</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1983%E2%80%9384_European_Cup" title="1983–84 European Cup">1984</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Viktor_Sokol_(footballer,_born_1954)" title="Viktor Sokol (footballer, born 1954)">Sokol</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1984%E2%80%9385_European_Cup" title="1984–85 European Cup">1985</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Torbj%C3%B6rn_Nilsson" title="Torbjörn Nilsson">Nilsson</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michel_Platini" title="Michel Platini">Platini</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1985%E2%80%9386_European_Cup" title="1985–86 European Cup">1986</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Torbj%C3%B6rn_Nilsson" title="Torbjörn Nilsson">Nilsson</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1986%E2%80%9387_European_Cup" title="1986–87 European Cup">1987</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Borislav_Cvetkovi%C4%87" title="Borislav Cvetković">Cvetković</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1987%E2%80%9388_European_Cup" title="1987–88 European Cup">1988</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rui_%C3%81guas_(footballer)" title="Rui Águas (footballer)">R. Águas</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean-Marc_Ferreri" title="Jean-Marc Ferreri">Ferreri</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gheorghe_Hagi" title="Gheorghe Hagi">Hagi</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rabah_Madjer" title="Rabah Madjer">Madjer</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ally_McCoist" title="Ally McCoist">McCoist</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/M%C3%ADchel_(footballer,_born_1963)" title="Míchel (footballer, born 1963)">Míchel</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Petar_Nov%C3%A1k" title="Petar Novák">Novák</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1988%E2%80%9389_European_Cup" title="1988–89 European Cup">1989</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marco_van_Basten" title="Marco van Basten">Van Basten</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1989%E2%80%9390_European_Cup" title="1989–90 European Cup">1990</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean-Pierre_Papin" title="Jean-Pierre Papin">Papin</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rom%C3%A1rio" title="Romário">Romário</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1990%E2%80%9391_European_Cup" title="1990–91 European Cup">1991</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Pacult" title="Peter Pacult">Pacult</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean-Pierre_Papin" title="Jean-Pierre Papin">Papin</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1991%E2%80%9392_European_Cup" title="1991–92 European Cup">1992</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean-Pierre_Papin" title="Jean-Pierre Papin">Papin</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sergei_Yuran" title="Sergei Yuran">Yuran</a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr style="display: none;"><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;;width:1%">UEFA Champions League era</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1992%E2%80%9393_UEFA_Champions_League" title="1992–93 UEFA Champions League">1993</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rom%C3%A1rio" title="Romário">Romário</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1993%E2%80%9394_UEFA_Champions_League" title="1993–94 UEFA Champions League">1994</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ronald_Koeman" title="Ronald Koeman">Koeman</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wynton_Rufer" title="Wynton Rufer">Rufer</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1994%E2%80%9395_UEFA_Champions_League" title="1994–95 UEFA Champions League">1995</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Weah" title="George Weah">Weah</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1995%E2%80%9396_UEFA_Champions_League" title="1995–96 UEFA Champions League">1996</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jari_Litmanen" title="Jari Litmanen">Litmanen</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1996%E2%80%9397_UEFA_Champions_League" title="1996–97 UEFA Champions League">1997</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Milinko_Panti%C4%87" title="Milinko Pantić">Pantić</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1997%E2%80%9398_UEFA_Champions_League" title="1997–98 UEFA Champions League">1998</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alessandro_Del_Piero" title="Alessandro Del Piero">Del Piero</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1998%E2%80%9399_UEFA_Champions_League" title="1998–99 UEFA Champions League">1999</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andriy_Shevchenko" title="Andriy Shevchenko">Shevchenko</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dwight_Yorke" title="Dwight Yorke">Yorke</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1999%E2%80%932000_UEFA_Champions_League" title="1999–2000 UEFA Champions League">2000</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/M%C3%A1rio_Jardel" title="Mário Jardel">Jardel</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ra%C3%BAl_(footballer)" title="Raúl (footballer)">Raúl</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rivaldo" title="Rivaldo">Rivaldo</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2000%E2%80%9301_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2000–01 UEFA Champions League">2001</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ra%C3%BAl_(footballer)" title="Raúl (footballer)">Raúl</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2001%E2%80%9302_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2001–02 UEFA Champions League">2002</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ruud_van_Nistelrooy" title="Ruud van Nistelrooy">Van Nistelrooy</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2002%E2%80%9303_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2002–03 UEFA Champions League">2003</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ruud_van_Nistelrooy" title="Ruud van Nistelrooy">Van Nistelrooy</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2003%E2%80%9304_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2003–04 UEFA Champions League">2004</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fernando_Morientes" title="Fernando Morientes">Morientes</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2004%E2%80%9305_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2004–05 UEFA Champions League">2005</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ruud_van_Nistelrooy" title="Ruud van Nistelrooy">Van Nistelrooy</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2005%E2%80%9306_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2005–06 UEFA Champions League">2006</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andriy_Shevchenko" title="Andriy Shevchenko">Shevchenko</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2006%E2%80%9307_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2006–07 UEFA Champions League">2007</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kak%C3%A1" title="Kaká">Kaká</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2007%E2%80%9308_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2007–08 UEFA Champions League">2008</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">Ronaldo</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2008%E2%80%9309_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2008–09 UEFA Champions League">2009</a>: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2009%E2%80%9310_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2009–10 UEFA Champions League">2010</a>: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2010%E2%80%9311_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2010–11 UEFA Champions League">2011</a>: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2011%E2%80%9312_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2011–12 UEFA Champions League">2012</a>: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2012%E2%80%9313_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2012–13 UEFA Champions League">2013</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">Ronaldo</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2013%E2%80%9314_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2013–14 UEFA Champions League">2014</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">Ronaldo</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2014%E2%80%9315_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2014–15 UEFA Champions League">2015</a>: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Neymar" title="Neymar">Neymar</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">Ronaldo</a></li>

<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2017%E2%80%9318_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2017–18 UEFA Champions League">2018</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">Ronaldo</a></li>

<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2019%E2%80%9320_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2019–20 UEFA Champions League">2020</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Lewandowski" title="Robert Lewandowski"> Lewandowski</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2020%E2%80%9321_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2020–21 UEFA Champions League">2021</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erling_Haaland" title="Erling Haaland">Haaland</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2021%E2%80%9322_UEFA_Champions_League" title="2021–22 UEFA Champions League">2022</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Karim_Benzema" title="Karim Benzema">Benzema</a></li>

</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1979%E2%80%9380_La_Liga" title="1979–80 La Liga">1980</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quini" title="Quini">Quini</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1980%E2%80%9381_La_Liga" title="1980–81 La Liga">1981</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quini" title="Quini">Quini</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1981%E2%80%9382_La_Liga" title="1981–82 La Liga">1982</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quini" title="Quini">Quini</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1982%E2%80%9383_La_Liga" title="1982–83 La Liga">1983</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hip%C3%B3lito_Rinc%C3%B3n" title="Hipólito Rincón">Rincón</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1983%E2%80%9384_La_Liga" title="1983–84 La Liga">1984</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jorge_da_Silva" title="Jorge da Silva">Da Silva</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Juanito_(footballer,_born_1954)" title="Juanito (footballer, born 1954)">Juanito</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1984%E2%80%9385_La_Liga" title="1984–85 La Liga">1985</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hugo_S%C3%A1nchez" title="Hugo Sánchez">Sánchez</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1985%E2%80%9386_La_Liga" title="1985–86 La Liga">1986</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hugo_S%C3%A1nchez" title="Hugo Sánchez">Sánchez</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1986%E2%80%9387_La_Liga" title="1986–87 La Liga">1987</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hugo_S%C3%A1nchez" title="Hugo Sánchez">Sánchez</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1987%E2%80%9388_La_Liga" title="1987–88 La Liga">1988</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hugo_S%C3%A1nchez" title="Hugo Sánchez">Sánchez</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1988%E2%80%9389_La_Liga" title="1988–89 La Liga">1989</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baltazar_(footballer,_born_1959)" title="Baltazar (footballer, born 1959)">Baltazar</a></span></li>

<div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1236075235"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Copa_del_Rey_top_scorers28" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner mw-made-collapsible mw-collapsed" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: gold;"><button type="button" class="mw-collapsible-toggle mw-collapsible-toggle-default mw-collapsible-toggle-collapsed" aria-expanded="false" tabindex="0" style="color: inherit;"><span class="mw-collapsible-text" style="color: inherit;">show</span></button><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1239400231"><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Template:Copa_del_Rey_top_scorers" title="Template:Copa del Rey top scorers"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Template_talk:Copa_del_Rey_top_scorers" title="Template talk:Copa del Rey top scorers"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:EditPage/Template:Copa_del_Rey_top_scorers" title="Special:EditPage/Template:Copa del Rey top scorers"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Copa_del_Rey_top_scorers28" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Copa_del_Rey" title="Copa del Rey">Copa del Rey</a> top scorers</div></th></tr><tr style="display: none;"><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1986: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Mariano_Azcona&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Mariano Azcona (page does not exist)">Azcona</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Julio_Merayo&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Julio Merayo (page does not exist)">Merayo</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rub%C3%A9n_Sosa" title="Rubén Sosa">R. Sosa</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1987: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hugo_S%C3%A1nchez" title="Hugo Sánchez">H. Sánchez</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Narciso_Manuel_Rodr%C3%ADguez_de_Armas&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Narciso Manuel Rodríguez de Armas (page does not exist)">Narciso</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1988: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jos%C3%A9_Mar%C3%ADa_Bakero" class="mw-redirect" title="José María Bakero">Bakero</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1989: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Jes%C3%BAs_Alzugaray&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Jesús Alzugaray (page does not exist)">Alzugaray</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1990: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Aldridge" title="John Aldridge">Aldridge</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gabriel_Moya_(footballer)" title="Gabriel Moya (footballer)">Moya</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1991: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jos%C3%A9_%C3%81ngel_Ziganda" title="José Ángel Ziganda">Ziganda</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1992: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anton_Polster" class="mw-redirect" title="Anton Polster">Polster</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Antonio_Jos%C3%A9_Rivera_M%C3%ADnguez&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Antonio José Rivera Mínguez (page does not exist)">Rivera</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eduardo_Rodr%C3%ADguez_Fern%C3%A1ndez" class="mw-redirect" title="Eduardo Rodríguez Fernández">Rodríguez</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1993: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jan_Urban" title="Jan Urban">Urban</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1994: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Juan_Carlos_Ruiz_Garc%C3%ADa&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Juan Carlos Ruiz García (page does not exist)">Coca</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vladimir_Gudelj" title="Vladimir Gudelj">Gudelj</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1995: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lyuboslav_Penev" title="Lyuboslav Penev">Penev</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1996: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Milinko_Panti%C4%87" title="Milinko Pantić">Pantić</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1997: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diego_Klimowicz" title="Diego Klimowicz">Klimowicz</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1998: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rivaldo" title="Rivaldo">Rivaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1999: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Claudio_L%C3%B3pez_(footballer)" title="Claudio López (footballer)">C. López</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2000: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Igor_Arenaza&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Igor Arenaza (page does not exist)">Arenaza</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Jo%C3%A3o_Maria_Menezes&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="João Maria Menezes (page does not exist)">Barata</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luis_Cembranos" title="Luis Cembranos">Cembranos</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Constantin_G%C3%A2lc%C4%83" title="Constantin Gâlcă">Gâlcă</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jimmy_Floyd_Hasselbaink" title="Jimmy Floyd Hasselbaink">Hasselbaink</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/M%C3%ADchel_(footballer,_born_August_1977)" title="Míchel (footballer, born August 1977)">Míchel</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yordi" title="Yordi">Yordi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2001: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Salva_Ballesta" title="Salva Ballesta">Salva</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2002: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guti" title="Guti">Guti</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ra%C3%BAl_(footballer)" title="Raúl (footballer)">Raúl</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2009: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lu%C3%ADs_Fabiano" title="Luís Fabiano">Luís Fabiano</a></span></li>

<div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1236075235"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Aldo_Rovira_Trophy74" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner mw-made-collapsible mw-collapsed" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background:#26559B; color:gold; border:1px solid #C32148"><button type="button" class="mw-collapsible-toggle mw-collapsible-toggle-default mw-collapsible-toggle-collapsed" aria-expanded="false" tabindex="0" style="color: inherit;"><span class="mw-collapsible-text" style="color: inherit;">show</span></button><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1239400231"><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Template:Trofeo_Aldo_Rovira" title="Template:Trofeo Aldo Rovira"><abbr title="View this template" style="color:gold">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Template_talk:Trofeo_Aldo_Rovira" title="Template talk:Trofeo Aldo Rovira"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style="color:gold">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:EditPage/Template:Trofeo_Aldo_Rovira" title="Special:EditPage/Template:Trofeo Aldo Rovira"><abbr title="Edit this template" style="color:gold">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Aldo_Rovira_Trophy74" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trofeo_Aldo_Rovira" title="Trofeo Aldo Rovira"><span style="color: gold">Aldo Rovira Trophy</span></a></div></th></tr><tr style="display: none;"><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em"><b>Men's winners</b><br>

<li><span class="nowrap">2023–24: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lamine_Yamal" title="Lamine Yamal">Yamal</a></span></li></ul></div></td></tr><tr style="display: none;"><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em"><b>Women's winners</b><br>

<div class="navbox-styles"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1236075235"></div><div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="BBC_Sports_Personality_World_Sport_Star_of_the_Year55" style="width:{{{width}}};;padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner mw-made-collapsible mw-collapsed" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2"><button type="button" class="mw-collapsible-toggle mw-collapsible-toggle-default mw-collapsible-toggle-collapsed" aria-expanded="false" tabindex="0" style="color: inherit;"><span class="mw-collapsible-text" style="color: inherit;">show</span></button><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1129693374"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1239400231"><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Template:BBC_Sports_Personality_World_Sport_Star_of_the_Year" title="Template:BBC Sports Personality World Sport Star of the Year"><abbr title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Template_talk:BBC_Sports_Personality_World_Sport_Star_of_the_Year" title="Template talk:BBC Sports Personality World Sport Star of the Year"><abbr title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:EditPage/Template:BBC_Sports_Personality_World_Sport_Star_of_the_Year" title="Special:EditPage/Template:BBC Sports Personality World Sport Star of the Year"><abbr title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="BBC_Sports_Personality_World_Sport_Star_of_the_Year55" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BBC_Sports_Personality_World_Sport_Star_of_the_Year" title="BBC Sports Personality World Sport Star of the Year">BBC Sports Personality World Sport Star of the Year</a></div></th></tr><tr style="display: none;"><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1960: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Herb_Elliott" title="Herb Elliott">Herb Elliott</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1961: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Valeriy_Brumel" title="Valeriy Brumel">Valeriy Brumel</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1962: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donald_Jackson_(figure_skater)" title="Donald Jackson (figure skater)">Donald Jackson</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1963: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jacques_Anquetil" title="Jacques Anquetil">Jacques Anquetil</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1964: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abebe_Bikila" title="Abebe Bikila">Abebe Bikila</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1965: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ron_Clarke" title="Ron Clarke">Ron Clarke</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gary_Player" title="Gary Player">Gary Player</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1966: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eus%C3%A9bio" title="Eusébio">Eusébio</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Garfield_Sobers" title="Garfield Sobers">Garfield Sobers</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1967: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Moore_(jockey)" title="George Moore (jockey)">George Moore</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1968: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ludmila_Belousova" title="Ludmila Belousova">Ludmila Belousova</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oleg_Protopopov" title="Oleg Protopopov">Oleg Protopopov</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1969: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rod_Laver" title="Rod Laver">Rod Laver</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1970: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pel%C3%A9" title="Pelé">Pelé</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1971: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lee_Trevino" title="Lee Trevino">Lee Trevino</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1972: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Olga_Korbut" title="Olga Korbut">Olga Korbut</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1973: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muhammad_Ali" title="Muhammad Ali">Muhammad Ali</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1974: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muhammad_Ali" title="Muhammad Ali">Muhammad Ali</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1975: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arthur_Ashe" title="Arthur Ashe">Arthur Ashe</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1976: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nadia_Com%C4%83neci" title="Nadia Comăneci">Nadia Comăneci</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1977: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Niki_Lauda" title="Niki Lauda">Niki Lauda</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1978: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muhammad_Ali" title="Muhammad Ali">Muhammad Ali</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1979: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bj%C3%B6rn_Borg" title="Björn Borg">Björn Borg</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1980: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_Nicklaus" title="Jack Nicklaus">Jack Nicklaus</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1981: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chris_Evert" title="Chris Evert">Chris Evert</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1982: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jimmy_Connors" title="Jimmy Connors">Jimmy Connors</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1983: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carl_Lewis" title="Carl Lewis">Carl Lewis</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1984: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seve_Ballesteros" title="Seve Ballesteros">Seve Ballesteros</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1985: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boris_Becker" title="Boris Becker">Boris Becker</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1986: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greg_Norman" title="Greg Norman">Greg Norman</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1987: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Martina_Navratilova" title="Martina Navratilova">Martina Navratilova</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1988: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steffi_Graf" title="Steffi Graf">Steffi Graf</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1989: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mike_Tyson" title="Mike Tyson">Mike Tyson</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1990: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mal_Meninga" title="Mal Meninga">Mal Meninga</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1991: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mike_Powell_(long_jumper)" title="Mike Powell (long jumper)">Mike Powell</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">1996: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Evander_Holyfield" title="Evander Holyfield">Evander Holyfield</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Johnson_(sprinter)" title="Michael Johnson (sprinter)">Michael Johnson</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1997: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Martina_Hingis" title="Martina Hingis">Martina Hingis</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2002: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ronaldo_(Brazilian_footballer)" title="Ronaldo (Brazilian footballer)">Ronaldo</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2010: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rafael_Nadal" title="Rafael Nadal">Rafael Nadal</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2011: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Lionel Messi</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr style="display: none;"><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%">Male and female<br>awards separated</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em"></div><table class="nowraplinks navbox-subgroup" style="border-spacing:0"><tbody><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%">Male award</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-even" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">

              --lns-unit: 8px;

              --ds-text-subtlest: #6B6E76;

              --ds-background-information-bold: #1868DB;
              --ds-background-accent-green-bolder: #1F845A;
